Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0b10pre) Gecko/20110116 Firefox/4.0b10pre

With 24 tabs, no Pin Tab, CPU = 1/2%. Memory 550Mo.
If I have 3 Pin Tabs CPU=40/60% (stable at 45%) and the memory is about + 10/20%.
I have Bartab.



Reproducible: Didn't try

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Pin 3 tabs
2. Open and close a few tabs (as usual)
3. surf during i don't know 10 min

comments.text: Which URLs have you open in those app tabs?

comments.text: Can you please recheck the second URL? I can see spikes in the cpu load which are probably caused by the animated Javascript news on that page. It's not related to any app tab for me.
